name: Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING, INC., Michael Colleran and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of CBS Broadcasting, Inc. and Michael Colleran

parties: Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING, INC., Michael Colleran and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of CBS Broadcasting, Inc. and Michael Colleran.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of October, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as a Petition for Review, the Petition to Supplement the Record, and the Application to File Reply are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
30 A.3d 1103
Alycia LANE v. CBS BROADCASTING, INC., Michael Colleran and Lawrence Mendte. Petition of CBS Broadcasting, Inc. and Michael Colleran.
No. 56 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 27, 2011.
